attributes.action: use the words "taxpayer's money" in all government statements on investments or spending
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: no statement, written or spoken, should be made on any Government spending, investment, procurement or donation etc without stating clearly that it is taxpayer's money first.  "The government has spent £X million in a new computer system", becomes the Government has spent £X million of "taxpayer's money" in a new computer system. other examples of the new statement; We have spent £X billion of "taxpayer's money" on the war; the cost of security for a given individual in 2009 was £X million of "taxpayer's money". We are spending £30 million of "taxpayers money" on extending broadband. Investment in the National Health Service by the Government has reached £X billion of "taxpayer's money".
